metadata.Title: CVE-2019-3890 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: It was discovered evolution-ews before 3.31.3 does not check the validity of SSL certificates. An attacker could abuse this flaw to get confidential information by tricking the user into connecting to a fake server without the user noticing the difference.

criterions.comment: evolution-ews package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
